versions.description: Improved diagnostics and smoother throttle response
changelog: New variometer display show altitude changes
Display BMS, ESC, and internal notifications for warnings and critical alerts
Enhanced throttle smoothing especially for chill mode

versions.description: Enhanced haptic feedback and system performance
changelog: Enhanced haptic feedback with precise buzzer control and dedicated vibration motor task
Improved throttle and cruise control with smoother transitions and expanded activation states
Updated BLE communication with structured firmware version transmission
Better task management for vibration operations and overall system performance
